#summary changedFrom([property])
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelObjectFunctions Model Object Functions]

*Description*:

Returns the previous value of a property that has changed. Returns an empty string if no previous value exists.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *property* || string || true || - || Name of property to get the previous value for ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset member = model("member").findByKey(params.memberId)>
<cfset member.email = params.newEmail>
<cfset oldValue = member.changedFrom(property="email")>
}}}

*Related*:

 * [hasChanged hasChanged()] (function)
 * [XXXHasChanged XXXHasChanged()] (function)
 * [XXXChangedFrom XXXChangedFrom()] (function)
 * [changedProperties changedProperties()] (function)
